name: TECLA
tagline: Augment your technical team with top talent.
description:
TECLA is a staff augmentation company with offices in Seattle, Washington and South America. We partner with clients who are looking to bring on remote full-time developers and designers onto their own in-house development teams. 
Work will full-time devs and designers for as long as you need them. On-demand. Fully vetted.
We help awesome tech startups augment their technical teams with the best, vetted, engineers and designers in South America through a network of top talent based in Peru, Chile, Argentina, Brazil, and Mexico. 
We work with engineers proficient in:
iOS
Android SDK
JavaScript
Node.js
React.js
AngularJS
MEAN Stack
Python
Ruby on Rails
PHP
AngularJS
React.js
LESS / Sass / Stylus
SQL & NoSQL Databases
We've worked with companies that range from pre-seed startups to large enterprise, and collaborated with multi-national brands like BMW, Miller, and Roche.
Because we love working with innovative tech startups, we've had the chance to help staff startups that have raised $30M+ in combined funding and operate in industries such as e-commerce, real estate, social networking, augmented reality, sharing economy, SaaS, fashion, and more.
